src_original: bhagavān mṛdutaruṇahastapādaḥ. tatreyaṃ mṛdutaruṇahastapādatā:  tadyathā śālmalikambalaṃ karpāsakambalaṃ vā,  yādṛśam anyapuruṣāṇāṃ nāsti;  bhagavān dīrghāṅguliḥ. tatreyaṃ dīrghāṅgulitā:  tasya hastapādāṅgulayo 'tidīrghā,  yādṛśam anyapuruṣāṇāṃ nāsti;
tgt_original: 三者手足網縵，猶如鵝王。

src_original: bhagavān jalahastapādah:  tasya hastapādayor jālāny avanaddhāni,
tgt_original: 四者手足柔軟，猶如天衣。

src_original: yādṛśam anyapuruṣāṇāṃ nāsti;  bhagavān āyatapārṣṇiḥ. tatrāyam āyatapārṣṇiḥ:  tasya pādapāṛṣnitale āyate,  yādṛśam anyapuruṣāṇāṃ nāsti;
tgt_original: 五者手足指纖，長無能及者。

src_original: bhagavān ucchaṅkhapādaḥ. tatreyam ucchaṅkhapādatā:  āyatapārṣṇyā saṃprayoga āyatapārṣṇer gulphasya ca sandhir adṛśyatvena saṃyujyate,
tgt_original: 六者足跟充滿，觀視無厭。

src_original: yādṛśam anyapuruṣāṇāṃ nāsti;  bhagavān aiṇeyajaṅghaḥ. tatrāyam aiṇeyajaṅghaḥ:  tasya jaṅghe anupūrvatanuke bhūtvā samyag anupūrve bhavataḥ;
tasyaikaikaromakūpebhya ekaikāni romāṇi jātāni nīlāni kuṇḍalāvartāni snigdhakomalāni;
tgt_original: 十一、一一孔一毛生，其毛右旋，紺琉璃色。
